features: With Comfortable Lighting:The desk lamp can provide you with eye-friendly and comfortable lighting for a long time, simulating natural light illumination, bright, clear and flicker-free. It is the ideal lighting for working and studying.

Lighting for many occasions: the LED desk light has 5 light colors and 6 brightness levels. You can easily choose a variety of lights for painting, reading, writing, crafts, nail art, kindle reading lighting needs.
Sleep Night Light: soft and not harsh warm color light, accompany you to sleep all night, ideal for bedside lamps.
Convenient Charging Port: Having a USB output port can provide 5V/1A power output for your cell phone or other devices. The charging power will not make your phone hot.

The table lamp has ETL safety certification given by American Electrical Laboratories, please feel free to use it. If you have any questions, you can always email us. (Note: Please use a 5V/2A or above adapter, adapter is not provided with this product)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GLITI Desk Lamp has brought a clear, bright and comfortable lighting experience to many people. It is a product that offers a wide range of services, including the ability to adjust the light as you wish, safe and stable charging of devices, a night light to accompany you to sleep, a 45-minute timer light, a minimalist look and a convenient size to provide comfortable lighting for a long time, whether for painting, writing, nail art, computer reading or arts and crafts.

GLITI Desk Lamp has brought a clear, bright and comfortable lighting experience to many people. It is a product that offers a wide range of services, including the ability to adjust the light as you wish, safe and stable charging of devices, a night light to accompany you to sleep, a 45-minute timer light, a minimalist look and a convenient size to provide comfortable lighting for a long time, whether for painting, writing, nail art, computer reading or arts and crafts.

5 color mods Bright white, cool white, natural light, yellowish, yellow and other 5 different color lighting modes can be selected. 6 brightness levels Each color is matched with six different brightness adjustments, for a total of 30 different illuminations. AUTO-OFF Timer 45 minutes automatic shutdown function, designed for reading before bedtime.

USB Charging Port Provides a safe 5V/1A output,Convenient charging for your mobile devices. Adjustable light arm The lamp arm can be adjusted by 225°, the pole can be adjusted by 90°, and the earth axis can be adjusted by 160°.flexible adjustment of lighting angle. Energy Efficient LED lamp 80% less energy consumption than incandescent lamps in the same situation，Up to 50000hrs Lifespan.no Lead or Mercury.

ETL safety certification The lamp received an ETL safety certification report from the Electronic Testing Laboratory, an authoritative testing organization founded in the United States by inventor Thomas Edison.
Package includes: 1* LED Multi-function Lamp 1* Power adapter cable 1* User Manual Note: Please use 5V/2A or more adapter. To avoid damages to eyes, please do not look in the LEDs directly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice replacement for my old style desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: "GLITI LED Desk Lamp" Works great, looks great, doesn't use as much space as a standard spring arm desk lamp. Nice black finish, joints work smooth, not top heavy so it doesn't tend to tip over, sturdy feel, nice light diffusion, the different color and brightness settings are actually useful, all controls are touch, easy to figure out. Comes with a USB-C cord, but does NOT come with an AC adapter. You'll need to supply your own USB wall wart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice (one flaw for my use)
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice desk lamp, looks good, bright illumination, very adjustable, works well.The flaw, for me, is that I intended to use it on a remote switch. But, when power goes off, then when power comes back on the lamp doesn't come on, you have to go to the lamp and press the switch. So, it doesn't work for how I was going to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Light works as advertised. Like the range of options for light temperature, warm to cool and the folding arm so it's out of the way when not in use. Product feels solid for a low profile, light-weight item. Appreciate that it's made of metal rather than plastic. Thought this ran on a rechargeable battery (probably because I viewed quite a few lamps and overlooked the fact that it needed to be plugged in. (Not a big issue). Got around this by plugging it in to a portable rechargeable power pack (for recharging cell phones, laptops, etc.). Works fine and the power pack charge lasts surprisingly long, probably due to the low draw from the LED lights. Haven't used the wireless charging feature yet but assume it'll work fine like the other features of the lamp. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice light for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Works great for what I need it for. I like the 5 types of light you can choose from, and the dimmer works great. The one thing that I don't like is that with the USB charging port that I wanted for my Iphone to charge will not work with the charger pad, but will work with when just pluging in the cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed at the quality, style, and functionality of this desk lamp. It’s sleek, sturdy, and has some great options that make it more than a desk lamp. The wireless charging pad, additional USB port, timer function, color options, brightness settings, and flexibility to aim the LEDs were all things that impressed me about this lamp. Even the box and packaging are premium. I would absolutely buy another if I needed a 2nd desk lamp and may anyway just to find a place for it. Highly recommend! This lamp is an amazing value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cool Lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure if I would like this when I ordered it but I am beyond thrilled at the versatility of this inexpensive desk lamp. It is ultra modern and takes up hardly any room. I love that I can adjust the warmth of the light as I don't care for the fluorescent look LED lights give off. I'm very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and useful
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp. It’s super stylish and I love adjusting the white light. I hate the harsh overhead fluorescent lighting at work so I love to turn on the lights and use this lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality lighting and practical
reviews.reviewText: Happy with light, the color and temp options are great . Overall very satisfied with it
